common.email_already_registered_message: There is already an account with this email, please login with email.
common.double_bet_description: A single bet on two outcomes in different events. Both selections must be successful to have a return.
common.triple_bet_description: A single bet on three outcomes in different events. All three selections must win to guarantee a return.
common.trixie_bet_description: A bet comprising three selections and four bets – three doubles and a treble. A minimum of two selections must win to guarantee a return. For example, a £2.50 Trixie would cost £10. A £2.50 each-way Trixie would cost £20.
common.patent_bet_description: A bet involving three selections and seven bets – three singles, three doubles, and one treble. It is the equivalent of a Trixie but with the addition of three singles. For example, a £2.50 Patent would cost £17.50.
common.accumulator_bet_description: An accumulator comprises of four or more selections in one bet. All of the selections must win to guarantee a return.
common.yankee_bet_description: A bet consisting of four selections and 11 bets – six doubles, four trebles, and a fourfold. A minimum of two selections must win to guarantee you a return. For example, a £2 Yankee would cost £22.
common.lucky_15_bet_description: A popular betting type among punters, it consists of four selections and 15 bets (hence the name) – four singles, six doubles, four trebles, and a fourfold. Equivalent to a Yankee but with four singles, and only one selection must win to guarantee you a return. For example, a £2 Lucky 15 would cost £30.
common.lucky_31_bet_description: A wager consisting of five selections and 31 bets – five singles, ten doubles, ten trebles, five fourfolds, and one fivefold. Only one selection must win to guarantee you a return. For example, a £1 Lucky 31 would cost £31.
common.lucky_63_bet_description: A Lucky 63 is a bet featuring six selections and 63 bets, including: six singles, 15 doubles, 20 trebles, 15 fourfolds, six fivefolds, and one sixfold.
common.canadian_bet_description: Also known as a Super Yankee, a Canadian is a bet on five selections consisting of 26 bets – ten doubles, ten trebles, five fourfolds, and a five-fold accumulator.
common.heinz_bet_description: The Heinz bet is a six-selection bet consisting of 57 bets: 15 doubles, 20 trebles, 15 fourfolds, six fivefolds, and a one sixfold accumulator. Aptly named after the 57 ‘varieties’ company slogan from Heinz, this 57 bet wager is a unique bet that combines every permutation of the 6 selections into one single wager.
common.super_heinz_bet_description: The Super Heinz is a bet on seven selections taking part in various events consisting of 21 doubles, 35 trebles, 35 fourfolds, 21 fivefolds, seven sixfolds, and a sevenfold accumulator which totals a huge 120 bets. Two selections must win to ensure any returns.
common.goliath_bet_description: A Goliath is a bet on eight selections taking part in various events consisting of 28 doubles, 56 trebles, 70 fourfolds, 56 fivefolds, 28 sixfolds, eight sevenfolds, and an eightfold accumulator totaling 247 bets. Two selections must win to ensure any returns.
common.forecast_bet_description: A bet where you predict the first two finishers in a race in the correct order.
common.tricast_bet_description: A bet where you predict the first three finishers in a race in the exact order.
common.reverse_forecast_description: A bet that involves selecting two horses, you win if they finish first and second in either order.
common.reverse_tricast_description: A bet that involves selecting three horses, you win if they finish first, second and third in any order.
common.folds: A single bet on {foldNumber} outcomes in different events. All {foldNumber} selections must win to guarantee a return.
common.please_login: Please login to see your bets
common.cookie_message: We use cookies to personalize content and ads, provide social media features, and analyze traffic. By clicking 'Accept All' you consent to our use of cookies. Click 'Preferences to manage preferences. Disabling some cookies may impact your experience.

finish_account_setup.swifty_app_identity_confirmation: To use the Swifty app we need to confirm your identity. Country laws and/or gambling license rules require Swifty to perform customer due diligence before a player is allowed to use our platform. At a minimum, we are required to verify customer names, addresses and date of births. These checks are aimed at helping prevent harm on gaming platforms and to stop crime.
